cis.name: Introduction to Computer Applications
cis.description: This course provides a survey of computer systems  and software, including an introduction to  computer programming, data organization and the  social impact of computing. The course emphasizes  application packages for personal and business  use.
cis.offering: Offered through Distance  Education format only.  Last Offering: - Summer  2021
